DOC.brief_summary: This study single arm , single center clinical trial aim evaluate effect 8 week vitamin K2 replacement ( 360 mcg/day ) progression arterial stiffness stable renal transplant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin K2 Supplementation Arterial Stiffness Renal Transplant Population ( The KING Trial )
DOC.criteria: Functional renal graft Stable renal function least 3 month prior enrollment History thrombotic event Diagnosed coagulopathy Cardiovascular event past month prior enrollment Current plan pregnancy Lactation Soy allergy Concomitant recent ( past 6 month ) use supplement contain vitamin K Warfarin treatment Known intestinal malabsorption hypomotility syndrome
